64022: All the sutras present from here onward till the the end of this @deva[पाद] should be considered as @deva[असिद्ध] towards each other when they are invoked in such a way that their @deva[आश्रय]s are exactly the same.
64024: The @deva[उपधा] @deva[नकार] of an @deva[अङ्ग] that is @deva[अनिदित्] and @deva[हलन्त] is removed in presence of a @deva[कित्] or a @deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय].
64025: The @deva[उपधा-नकार] of the verbs @deva[दंश्], @deva[सञ्ज्] and @deva[स्वञ्ज्] is removed in presence of the @deva[विकरणप्रत्यय] @deva[शप्] ।
64026: The @deva[उपधा-नकार] of the verb @deva[रञ्ज्] is removed in presence of the @deva[विकरणप्रत्यय] @deva[शप्].
64027: When followed by the @deva[घञ्-प्रत्यय] in the meaning of  @deva[भाव] or @deva[करण] the @deva[उपधा-नकार] of the verb root @deva[रञ्ज्] is removed.
64030: When used in the meaning of 'to pray', the @deva[नकार] of the verb root  @deva[अञ्च्] is not removed.
64031: In presence of the @deva[क्त्वा] @deva[प्रत्यय], the  @deva[उपधा-नकार] of the verb roots  @deva[स्कन्द्] and @deva[स्यन्द्] is not removed.
64032: The @deva[उपधा] @deva[नकार] of the  @deva[जकारान्त] verb roots and the verb root '@deva[नश्]' is optionally removed when followed by the @deva[क्त्वा] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64035: The @deva[शास्-धातु] gets the '@deva[शा]' @deva[आदेश] when followed by the @deva[हि-प्रत्यय] of @deva[लोट्लकार].
64036: The '@deva[हन्]' @deva[धातु] gets the '@deva[ज]' @deva[आदेश] when followed by the @deva[हि-प्रत्यय] of @deva[लोट्लकार].
64037:
1) For the verb roots that end in an @deva[अनुनासिक] letter and have an @deva[अनुदात्त] @deva[स्वर] in the @deva[उपदेश],
2) For the verb root @deva[वन्], and
3) For the verb roots that end in an @deva[अनुनासिक] letter and belong to the @deva[तनोत्यादिगण], 

The @deva[अनुनासिक] is removed when the verb is followed by a @deva[झलादि] @deva[कित्] /@deva[ङित्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64047: When followed by an @deva[आर्धधातुक] @deva[प्रत्यय], @deva[रेफ] and the @deva[उपधावर्ण] of the the verb root gets the '@deva[रम्]' @deva[आगम].
64071: In case of the @deva[लुङ्लकार], @deva[लङ्लकार] and @deva[लृङ्लकार], the @deva[अङ्ग] gets an '@deva[अट्]' @deva[आगम],  which is also @deva[उदात्त].
64072: For the @deva[लुङ्लकार], @deva[लङ्लकार] and @deva[लृङ्लकार], an @deva[अजादि] @deva[अङ्ग] gets an @deva[आट्-आगम], which is also @deva[उदात्त].
64073: In @deva[वेदाः] , even the verbs that are not @deva[अजादि] can be seen to get @deva[आट्-आगम] for @deva[लुङ्लकार], @deva[लङ्लकार], and @deva[लृङ्लकार].
64074: In presence of the @deva[अव्यय] @deva[माङ्], the @deva[अडागमः] / @deva[आडागमः] does not happen even in case of @deva[लुङ्लकार], @deva[लङ्लकार], and @deva[लृङ्लकार]
64075: In @deva[वेदाः], the @deva[अडागम] @deva[आडागम] may or may not be seen done in presence of @deva[माङ्].
64077: When followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[प्रत्यय],  the ending @deva[इवर्ण] and the @deva[उवर्ण] are converted respectively to @deva[इयङ्] / @deva[उवङ्] @deva[आदेश]s for  a) @deva[विकरणप्रत्यय] @deva[श्नु],  b) Any @deva[धातु], and  c) The word @deva[भ्रू].
64078: An  @deva[इवर्ण] and an @deva[उवर्ण] occurring at end of an @deva[अभ्यास] respectively get @deva[इयङ्] and @deva[उवङ्] @deva[आदेश] when followed by an @deva[असवर्ण]  letter.
64079: The word '@deva[स्त्री]' gets an @deva[इयङ्-आदेश] when followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64080: The word '@deva[स्त्री]' gets an @deva[इयङ्-आदेश] optionally when followed by @deva[अम्] @deva[प्रत्यय] or @deva[शस्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64081: The verb root @deva[इण्] gets a @deva[यणादेश] when followed by an @deva[अच्] letter.
64082: An @deva[इवर्ण] occurring at end of an a @deva[असंयोगपूर्व] @deva[धातु] which in turn occurs at end of an @deva[अनेकाच्] @deva[अङ्ग] is converted to @deva[यण्] letter when followed by an @deva[अजादिप्रत्यय].
64083: An @deva[उवर्ण] occurring at end of an a @deva[असंयोगपूर्व] @deva[धातु] which in turn occurs at end of an @deva[अनेकाच्] @deva[अङ्ग] is converted to @deva[यण्] letter when followed by a @deva[सुप्] @deva[अजादिप्रत्यय].
64084: The word @deva[वर्षाभू] gets a @deva[यणादेश] when followed by an @deva[अजादि-सुप्-प्रत्यय].
64085: The words @deva[भू] and @deva[सुधी] do not undergo @deva[यणादेश] when followed by @deva[अजादि] @deva[सुप्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64086: In @deva[वेदाः], the words @deva[भू] and @deva[सुधी] might or might not undergo a @deva[यणादेश] when followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[सुप्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64087: The @deva[उवर्ण] of an @deva[अनेकाच्-अङ्ग] of '@deva[हु]' @deva[तथा] '@deva[श्नु]' undergoes a @deva[यणादेश], provided that this @deva[उवर्ण] does not follow a @deva[संयोग].
64088: The verb root '@deva[भू]' gets a @deva[वुक्] @deva[आगम] when followed by an @deva[अजादि-प्रत्यय] of @deva[लुङ्लकार] or @deva[लिट्लकार].
64089: When the @deva[उपधा] of verb root @deva[गुह्] has a chance of undergoing a @deva[गुणादेश] while followed by an @deva[अजादिप्रत्यय], the @deva[गुणादेश] is blocked and the @deva[उपधा] becomes @deva[दीर्घ] instead.
64090: The @deva[उपधा] letter of the verb root  @deva[दुष्] is converted to @deva[ऊकार] when followed by the @deva[णिच्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64091: To indicate impurification of mind / intellect, the @deva[उपधा] letter of the verb root @deva[दुष्] is optionally converted to @deva[ऊकार] when followed by the @deva[णिच्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64092: The @deva[उपधा] letter of a @deva[मित्संज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] becomes @deva[ह्रस्व] when followed by the @deva[णिच्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64098: The @deva[उपधा] letter of the verb roots @deva[गम्], @deva[हन्], @deva[जन्], @deva[खन्], @deva[घस्] is removed when followed by a @deva[कित्] / @deva[ङित्] @deva[प्रत्यय], except for the @deva[अङ्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64101: The '@deva[हि]' @deva[प्रत्यय] that follows the verb root '@deva[हु]' or a @deva[झल्] letter is converted to '@deva[धि]'.
64104: The @deva[तिङ्] @deva[प्रत्यय] that follows the @deva[चिण्] @deva[विकरणप्रत्यय] undergoes a @deva[लुक्].
64105: The '@deva[हि]' @deva[प्रत्यय] that follows an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] is removed.
64106:
The '@deva[हि]' @deva[प्रत्यय] that follows an @deva[उकार] is deleted, provided -
a) The @deva[उकार] occurs at end of a @deva[प्रत्यय], and
b) A @deva[संयोग] is not present immediately before this @deva[उकार].
64107: The @deva[उकार] which occurs at end of a @deva[प्रत्यय] is optionally deleted when followed by a @deva[मकार] / @deva[वकार] , provided that a @deva[संयोग] is not present immediately before this @deva[उकार].
64108: The @deva[उकार] occurring at end of a @deva[प्रत्यय] that is attached to the verb root  @deva[कृ] is removed when followed by a @deva[मकार] or a @deva[वकार].
64109: The @deva[उकार] occurring at end of a @deva[प्रत्यय] that is attached to the verb root @deva[कृ] is removed when followed by a @deva[यकार].
64110: If an @deva[अङ्ग] of verb root @deva[कृ] ends in an @deva[उकारान्त] @deva[प्रत्यय], then the @deva[अकार] of that @deva[अङ्ग] is converted to @deva[उकार] when followed by a @deva[कित्] / @deva[ङित्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64111: The @deva[अकार] of the '@deva[श्नम्]' @deva[विकरण] and of  the verb root '@deva[अस्]' is removed when followed by a @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[किति] / @deva[ङित्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64112: The @deva[आकार] of the @deva[विकरण] @deva[श्ना] and also of an @deva[अभ्यस्त] is removed when followed by a @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[कित्] and @deva[ङित्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64113: The @deva[आकार] of the @deva[विकरण] @deva[श्ना] and also of an @deva[अभ्यस्त] is converted to @deva[ई] when followed by a @deva[हलादि] @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[कित्] and @deva[ङित्] @deva[प्रत्यय]. But this does not happen for the verb roots that get the term '@deva[घु]'.
64114: The @deva[आकार] of the verb root '@deva[दरिद्रा]' is converted to @deva[ह्रस्व-इकार] when followed by @deva[हलादि-सार्वधातुक] @deva[कित्]/@deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय].
64115: The last letter of the @deva[अङ्ग] of verb root '@deva[भी]' is optionally converted to @deva[ह्रस्व-इकार] when followed by @deva[हलादि-सार्वधातुक] @deva[कित्]/@deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय].
64116: The verb root '@deva[हा]' is converted to @deva[ह्रस्व-इकार] when followed by @deva[हलादि-सार्वधातुक] @deva[कित्]/@deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय].
64117: The verb root '@deva[हा]' gets an optional @deva[इकारादेश] or an @deva[आकारादेश] when followed by the @deva[प्रत्यय] '@deva[हि]'.
64118: The last letter of @deva[हा] is removed when followed by a @deva[यकारादि] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64119: The @deva[घु-संज्ञक] verb roots and the verb root @deva[अस्] get an @deva[एकार] as @deva[आदेश] when followed by the '@deva[हि]' @deva[प्रत्यय]. Also, @deva[अभ्यास], if present, is removed.
64120: When followed by a @deva[कित्-प्रत्यय] of @deva[लिट्-लकार], The @deva[अकारः] of an @deva[अङ्गम्] is converted to @deva[एकार], and the @deva[अभ्यास] is removed; provided that there is no @deva[संयोग] before as well as after this @deva[अकार], and that the first letter of the @deva[अङ्गम्] is not changed due to any @deva[आदेश].
64129: All the rules starting from this sutra, till the end of the sixth chapter are being told for a @deva[भसंज्ञक].
64130: The @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] of the word @deva[पाद्] gets @deva[पद्] as @deva[आदेश].
64133: The @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] of  @deva[श्वन्] , @deva[युवन्] and @deva[मघवन्] undergoes @deva[सम्प्रसारणम्] when followed by a @deva[प्रत्यय] which is not a @deva[तद्धितप्रत्यय].
64134: If a @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] ends in the word '@deva[अन्]' then the '@deva[अ]' of this '@deva[अन्]' is omitted.
64135: The @deva[उपधा-अकार] of a @deva[भसंज्ञकस्य] @deva[अङ्ग] is omitted in presence of an @deva[अण्-प्रत्यय], if the @deva[अङ्ग] ends in one of (1) @deva[षन्], (2) @deva[हन्] or (3) @deva[धृतराजन्] .
64136: If a @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] end in the word '@deva[अन्]' and is followed by the @deva[ङि] or @deva[शी] @deva[प्रत्यय], then the '@deva[अ]' of this '@deva[अन्]' is omitted optionally.
64137: For a @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] which ends in an '@deva[अन्]', and also contains a  @deva[मकारान्त] / @deva[वकारान्त] @deva[संयोगवर्ण] before this @deva[अन्], the '@deva[अ]' of @deva[अन्] does not get omitted.
64138: The @deva[अकार] of the word @deva[अच्] that occurs at end of a @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] is omitted if this '@deva[अच्]' happens to be derived from the @deva[धातु] @deva[अञ्च्] (@deva[गतौ]).
64139:
If the word @deva[अच्] -
(1) happens to be derived from the @deva[धातु] @deva[अञ्च्] (@deva[गतौ]) ,
(2) follows the word @deva[उद्],  and
(3) gets the @deva[भसंज्ञा], 
 then the @deva[अकार] of @deva[अच्] is converted to @deva[ईकार].
64140: The ending @deva[आकार] of the @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] of an @deva[आकारान्त] @deva[धातु] is removed.
64142: The '@deva[ति]' of the @deva[भसंज्ञक] '@deva[विंशति]' word is removed.
64143: The '@deva[टि]'component of a @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] is removed when followed by a @deva[डित्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
64144: The @deva[टिसंज्ञक] of a  @deva[नकारान्त] @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] is removed when followed by a @deva[तद्धितप्रत्यय].
64146: An @deva[उवर्णान्त] @deva[भसंज्ञक] undergoes a @deva[गुणादेश] when followed by a @deva[तद्धितप्रत्यय].
64147: The last letter of an @deva[उवर्णान्त-भसंज्ञक] word is removed when followed by a @deva[ढकारादि-तद्धितप्रत्यय]. But this does not happen for the word '@deva[कद्रू]'.
64148: The @deva[अकार] and @deva[इकार] of a @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] is removed when followed by a @deva[तद्धितप्रत्यय] or an @deva[ईकार].
71001: The  @deva[यु] and @deva[वु] belonging to a @deva[प्रत्यय] are converted respectively to @deva[अन] and @deva[अक].
71002: The letters @deva[फ्-ढ्-ख्-छ्-घ्] occurring at the beginning of a @deva[प्रत्यय] are converted respectively to @deva[आयन्-एय्-ईन्-ईय्] and @deva[इय्]
71003: The letter @deva[झ्] occurring in a @deva[प्रत्यय] is converted to @deva[अन्त्].
71004: @deva[झकार] of the @deva[प्रत्यय] that follows an @deva[अभ्यस्त] is converted to @deva[अत्].
71005: The @deva[झकार] of the @deva[आत्मनेपदी] @deva[प्रत्यय] that follows an @deva[अनदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets the '@deva[अत्]' @deva[आदेश].
71006: When the @deva[झ-प्रत्यय] attached to the verb root @deva[शीङ्] gets the @deva[आदेश] @deva[अत्], then this @deva[आदेश] also gets a @deva[आगम] '@deva[रुट्]'.
71009: The @deva[भिस्-प्रत्यय] following an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] is converted to @deva[ऐस्].
71012: The @deva[टा], @deva[ङसिँ], and @deva[ङस्] @deva[प्रत्ययाः] attached to an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] are converted respectively to @deva[इन], @deva[आत्] and @deva[स्य].
71013: The @deva[ङे] @deva[प्रत्यय] attached to an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] is converted to a @deva[यकार].
71014: The @deva[ङे-प्रत्यय] attached to an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[सर्वनाम] get an @deva[आदेश] '@deva[स्मै]'.
71015: The @deva[ङसिँ] and @deva[ङि] @deva[प्रत्यय]s attached to an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[सर्वनाम] are converted respectively to @deva[स्मात्] and @deva[स्मिन्].
71016: For the nine words - @deva[पूर्व], @deva[पर], @deva[अवर], @deva[दक्षिण], @deva[उत्तर], @deva[अपर], @deva[अधर], @deva[स्व], @deva[अन्तर] - when they are used as a @deva[सर्वनाम], the  @deva[ङसिँ] and @deva[ङि]- @deva[प्रत्यय]s after them are optionally converted to  @deva[स्मात्] and @deva[स्मिन्] respectively.
71017: The @deva[जस्-प्रत्यय] attached to an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[सर्वनाम] get an @deva[आदेश] @deva[शी].
71018: The  @deva[औ] and @deva[औट्-प्रत्यय]s following a @deva[आबन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] get the @deva[आदेश] '@deva[शी]'.
71019: The @deva[औ] and @deva[औट्-प्रत्यय]s following a @deva[नपुंसक] @deva[अङ्ग] get the @deva[आदेश] '@deva[शी]'.
71020: The  @deva[जस्]/@deva[शस्-प्रत्यय]s that follow a @deva[नपुंसकलिङ्ग] word get '@deva[शि]' @deva[आदेश].
71021: The @deva[जस्] and @deva[शस्] @deva[प्रत्यय]s following the '@deva[अष्टा]' form of the word @deva[अष्टन्] get the @deva[औश्] @deva[आदेश].
71023: The @deva[सुँ] and @deva[अम्] attached to a @deva[नपुंसक] @deva[अङ्ग] are removed.
71024: The @deva[सुँ] and @deva[अम्] attached to an @deva[अकारान्त] @deva[नपुंसक] @deva[अङ्ग] are converted to @deva[अम्].
71025: The @deva[सुँ] / @deva[अम्] @deva[प्रत्यय] occurring after the words ending in @deva[डतर] and @deva[डतम] @deva[प्रत्यय], and after the words '@deva[अन्य]', '@deva[अन्यतर]', '@deva[इतर]' gets the @deva[अद्ड्] @deva[आदेश].
71026: In case of Vedas - The @deva[सुँ] and @deva[अम्] @deva[प्रत्यय] occurring after the @deva[नपुंसकलिङ्गवाची] '@deva[इतर]' @deva[शब्द] do not get the @deva[अद्ड्-आदेशः] ।
71035: When the @deva[लोट्-लकार] is used to express the 'desire of unattainable', the  @deva[तु] and @deva[हि] @deva[प्रत्यय] are optionally converted to @deva[तातङ्].
71036: The @deva[शतृ] @deva[प्रत्यय] attached to the verb @deva[विद्] (@deva[ज्ञाने]) is optionally converted to  '@deva[वसुँ]'.
71052: An @deva[आम्-प्रत्यय] appearing after an @deva[अकारान्त] @deva[सर्वनामशब्द] gets a  @deva[सुट्-आगम].
71053: The word @deva[त्रि] gets the @deva[आदेश] '@deva[त्रय]' when followed by the @deva[प्रत्यय] '@deva[आम्]'.
71054: The @deva[आम्-प्रत्यय] that follows a @deva[ह्रस्व] word, a @deva[नदीसंज्ञक] word, or an @deva[आबन्त] word gets a @deva[नुट्-आगम].
71055: The  @deva[आम्-प्रत्यय] present after a @deva[षट्-संज्ञक] word or after the word @deva[चतुर्] gets a @deva[नुट्-आगम].
71058: The verb roots that have @deva[इकार] as @deva[इत्संज्ञक] get a @deva[नुमागम].
71059: The verb roots that belong to the @deva[मुचादि-अन्तर्गण], get a  @deva[नुम्-आगम] when followed by '@deva[श]' @deva[प्रत्यय].
71060: The verb roots @deva[मस्ज्] and @deva[नश्] get a @deva[नुमागम] when followed by a @deva[झलादि] @deva[प्रत्यय].
71061: The verb roots @deva[रध्] and @deva[जभ्] get a @deva[नुमागम] when followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[प्रत्यय].
71062: For the verb root @deva[रध्], there is no @deva[नुमागम] if an  @deva[इडागम] is done. However, in case of @deva[लिट्-लकार], @deva[नुमागम] happens in-spite of @deva[इडागम].
71063: The verb root @deva[रभ्] which is followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[प्रत्यय] gets a @deva[नुमागम]. But this @deva[नुमागम] is not seen in presence of @deva[शप्] @deva[विकरणप्रत्यय] as well as in presence of @deva[लिट्-लकार].
71064: The verb root @deva[लभ्] which is followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[प्रत्यय] gets a @deva[नुमागम]. But this @deva[नुमागम] is not seen in presence of @deva[शप्] @deva[विकरणप्रत्यय] as well as in presence of @deva[लिट्-लकार].
71065: The verb root @deva[आङ्] + @deva[लभ्] gets a  @deva[नुमागम] in the anticipation of a pratyay that starts with @deva[य्] ।
71066: The verb root @deva[उप] + @deva[लभ्] gets a  @deva[नुमागम] in the anticipation of a pratyay that starts with @deva[य्], if the intended meaning of the resultant word is 'to praise'.
71067: The verb root @deva[लभ्] gets a @deva[नुमागम] in presence of  @deva[खल्-प्रत्यय] and @deva[घञ्-प्रत्यय] (only when) it is attached to an @deva[उपसर्ग] .
71068: The verb root @deva[लभ्] , when attached to only the '@deva[सु]' or '@deva[दुर्]' @deva[उपसर्ग] (and no other @deva[उपसर्ग]) does not get a @deva[नुमागम] in presence of  @deva[खल्-प्रत्यय] and @deva[घञ्-प्रत्यय].
71069: The verb root @deva[लभ्] (when used without any @deva[उपसर्ग]) optionally gets a @deva[नुमागम] in presence of  @deva[चिण्-प्रत्यय] and @deva[णमुल्-प्रत्यय].
71071: The word @deva[युज्] gets @deva[नुमागम] in presence of a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान]. However, if this word is in a @deva[समस्तपद], then the @deva[नुमागम] does not happen.
71072: A @deva[झलन्त] and an @deva[अजन्त] @deva[नपुंसक] word gets a @deva[नुमागम] when followed by a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान].
71073: An @deva[इगन्त] @deva[नपुंसकलिङ्ग] word gets @deva[नुमागम] when followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय].
71074: According to @deva[गालवाचार्य], for a @deva[नपुंसकलिङ्ग] word which can be used also as a @deva[पुंलिङ्ग] word with the same meaning, the @deva[तृतीया] onwards forms are like that of the @deva[पुंलिङ्ग] word.
71075: The words @deva[अस्थि], @deva[दधि], @deva[सक्थि] and @deva[अक्षि] get an @deva[उदात्तः] @deva[अनङ्-आदेश] when followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[विभक्ति] of @deva[तृतीया] onwards.
71082: The @deva[अवर्ण] of the word @deva[अनडुह्] get a @deva[नुमागम] in presence of the @deva[सुँ] @deva[प्रत्यय].
71084: The word @deva[दिव्] gets the '@deva[औ]' @deva[आदेश] in presence of the @deva[प्रत्यय] @deva[सुँ] ।
71085: The words @deva[पथिन्], @deva[मथिन्] and @deva[ऋभुक्षिन्] get an '@deva[आ]' @deva[आदेश] in presence of  the @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय].
71086: The @deva[इकार] of the words @deva[पथिन्], @deva[मथिन्] and @deva[ऋभुक्षिन्] get an '@deva[अ]' @deva[आदेश] in presence of a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान].
71087: The @deva[थकार] of the words @deva[पथिन्] @deva[तथा] @deva[मथिन्] get the '@deva[न्थ्]' @deva[आदेश] in presence of a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान].
71088: The @deva[टि] of the @deva[भसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] of @deva[पथिन्], @deva[मथिन्] and @deva[ऋभुक्षिन्] is removed.
71089: The @deva[पुम्स्] @deva[अङ्ग] gets the @deva[असुङ्] @deva[आदेश] when it is expected to be followed by a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान].
71092: The  @deva[सर्वनामस्थानप्रत्यय] not belonging to @deva[सम्बोधन-एकवचन] when attached to the word @deva[सखि] becomes @deva[णित्].
71093: The word @deva[सखि] gets an @deva[अनङ्-आदेश] when it is followed by @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय] of  @deva[प्रथमा-एकवचन].
71094:
The @deva[ऋकारान्त]  words, and the words @deva[उशनस्]/@deva[पुरुदंसस्]/@deva[अनेहस्] get @deva[अनङ्] @deva[आदेश] when followed by a  @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय] not belonging to 
@deva[सम्बोधन] @deva[एकवचन].
71095: The word @deva[क्रोष्टु] behaves like a  @deva[तृच्-प्रत्ययान्त] word when followed by a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान] not belonging to  @deva[सम्बोधनैकवचनम्].
71096: In feminine context, the word @deva[क्रोष्टु] behaves similar to the @deva[तृच्-प्रत्ययान्त] words.
71097: The word @deva[क्रोष्टु] optionally behaves like a @deva[तृच्-प्रत्ययान्त] word when followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[विभक्ति] of @deva[तृतीया] onwards.
71098: The words @deva[चतुर्] and @deva[अनडुह्] get an @deva[उदात्तः] @deva[आम्-आगम] when followed by a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान].
71099: The words @deva[चतुर्] and @deva[अनडुह्] get an @deva[अमागम] when followed by  @deva[सुँ] @deva[प्रत्यय] of @deva[सम्बोधन-एकवचन].
71100: The last letter of the @deva[दीर्घ-ॠकारान्त-धातु] is converted to @deva[इकार].
71101: The @deva[उपधा-ॠकार] present in a @deva[धातु] is converted to @deva[इकार].
71102: If a verb root ends in a @deva[दीर्घ] @deva[ॠकार] before which an @deva[ओष्ठ्य] letter is present, the @deva[ॠकार] of that verb root is converted to @deva[उकार].
72001: An @deva[अङ्ग] ending in the @deva[सिच्-प्रत्यय] gets a @deva[वृद्धि] @deva[आदेश] in presence of a @deva[प्रत्यय] belonging to @deva[परस्मैपद].
72035: An @deva[आर्धधातुक-प्रत्यय] that starts with a @deva[वल्] letter gets an @deva[इट्] @deva[आगम].
72079: For @deva[सार्वधातुक-लिङ्लकार], the @deva[सकार] which is present in the @deva[प्रत्यय] but which is not present at the end of the @deva[प्रत्यय] is removed.
72080: '@deva[या]' present in the @deva[प्रत्यय] of  @deva[सार्वधातुक-लिङ्लकार] is converted to @deva[एय्] when it follows an @deva[अकार].
72084: The word @deva[अष्टन्] gets an optional @deva[आकारादेश] when followed by a @deva[हलादि] @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय].
72085: The word '@deva[रै]' gets an @deva[आकारादेश] when followed by  @deva[हलादि] @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय].
72099: The words  @deva[त्रि] and @deva[चतुर्] are respectively converted to @deva[तिसृ] and @deva[चतसृ] to indicate the feminine property, when followed by a @deva[विभक्ति-प्रत्यय]
72100: The @deva[ऋकार] of the words @deva[तिसृ] and @deva[चतसृ] is converted to @deva[रेफ] when followed by an  @deva[अजादि-विभक्तिप्रत्यय].
72101: The word @deva[जरा] is optionally converted to the word @deva[जरस्] when followed by an @deva[अजादि] @deva[विभक्ति].
72102: The words of @deva[त्यदादिगण] get an @deva[अकारादेश] when followed by a @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय].
72103: The word @deva[किम्] is converted to '@deva[क]' in presence of a @deva[विभक्ति] @deva[प्रत्यय].
72104: The word @deva[किम्] is converted to @deva[कु] when followed by a @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय] that begins with a @deva[शब्दस्य] @deva[तकार] or a @deva[हकार].
72105: The word @deva[किम्] is converted to @deva[क्व] when followed by the  @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय] '@deva[अत्]'.
72106: For the words of @deva[त्यदादिगण], a @deva[तकार] or a  @deva[दकार] which is not at end of the word is converted to @deva[सकार] when followed by the @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय].
72107: The word @deva[अदस्] gets an '@deva[औ]' @deva[आदेशः] when followed by the @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय], and the @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय] is removed.
72108: The word @deva[इदम्] gets a @deva[मकारादेश] when followed by the @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय].
72109: The @deva[दकार] of the word @deva[इदम्] is converted to a @deva[मकार] when followed by a @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय].
72110: The @deva[दकार] of the word  @deva[इदम्] is converted to @deva[यकार] when followed by the  @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय].
72111: In @deva[पुंलिङ्ग], the '@deva[इद्]' part of the word '@deva[इदम्]' is converted to  '@deva[अय्]' when followed by the  @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय].
72112: The '@deva[इद्]' part of the word  '@deva[इदम्]' is converted to @deva[अन्] when followed by a @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय] of @deva[तृतीया] to @deva[सप्तमी].  But this conversion does not happen if the word @deva[इदम्] has a @deva[ककार] in it.
72113: The '@deva[इद्]' part of the word '@deva[इदम्]' is removed when followed by a @deva[हलादि] @deva[विभक्तिप्रत्यय] of @deva[तृतीया] to @deva[सप्तमी]. But this conversion does not happen if the word @deva[इदम्] has a @deva[ककार] in it.
72115: An @deva[अजन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] undergoes @deva[वृद्धि] when followed by a  @deva[णित्] or a @deva[ञित्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
72116: The @deva[उपधा-अकार] of an @deva[अङ्ग] undergoes a @deva[वृद्धिः] when followed by a @deva[णित्] or a @deva[ञित्] @deva[प्रत्यय].
72117: When followed by a @deva[णित्] / @deva[ञित्] @deva[तद्धित-प्रत्यय], the @deva[आदि-स्वर] of the @deva[अङ्ग] undergoes a @deva[वृद्धि].
72118: When followed by a @deva[कित्] @deva[तद्धित-प्रत्यय], the @deva[आदि-स्वर] of the @deva[अङ्ग] undergoes a @deva[वृद्धि].
73010: This is an @deva[अधिकार], which spans till  '@deva[यथातथयथापुरयोः] @deva[पर्यायेण]' 7.3.31. Whatever is being told in this @deva[अधिकार] happens only to an @deva[उत्तरपद].
73050: A @deva[ठकार] present at the beginning of a @deva[प्रत्यय] is converted to '@deva[इक्]'.
73051:
A @deva[ठकार] present at the beginning of a @deva[प्रत्यय] is converted to '@deva[क्]' for an @deva[इस्-प्रत्ययान्त] @deva[अङ्ग], @deva[उस्-प्रत्ययान्त] @deva[अङ्ग], 
@deva[उक्-वर्णान्त] @deva[अङ्ग] and @deva[तकारान्त] @deva[अङ्ग].
73054: The @deva[हकार] of the verb @deva[हन्] undergoes  @deva[कुत्वम्] in presence of (1) a @deva[ञित्-प्रत्यय], (2) a @deva[णित्-प्रत्यय], (3) a @deva[नकार].
73084: When followed by an @deva[सार्वधातुक] or an @deva[आर्धधातुक] @deva[प्रत्यय], an @deva[इगन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets a @deva[गुणादेश].
73086: When followed by a @deva[सार्वधातुक] or an @deva[आर्धधातुक]  @deva[प्रत्यय], a @deva[पुगन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] and a @deva[लघूपध] @deva[अङ्ग] get a @deva[गुणादेश].
73088: For the verbs @deva[भू] and @deva[सु], the @deva[अङ्ग] does not undergo a @deva[गुण] when followed by a @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[तिङ्-प्रत्यय].
73093: A @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[पित्] @deva[प्रत्यय] which begins with a @deva[हल्]-letter gets  @deva[ईट्]  @deva[आगम] when attached to the verb @deva[ब्रू].
73094: A @deva[हलादि-पित्-सार्वधातुकप्रत्यय] attached to a @deva[यङ्-प्रत्ययान्त-अङ्ग] gets @deva[ईडागम] optionally.
73095: A @deva[हलादि] @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[तिङ्] @deva[प्रत्यय] optionally gets an @deva[ईट्] @deva[आगम] when it is attached to the verbs @deva[तु], @deva[रु], @deva[स्तु], @deva[शम्], @deva[अम्]
73096: A @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[प्रत्यय] which contains only one @deva[हल्] letter (and no @deva[अच्] letter) gets an  '@deva[ईट्]' @deva[आगम] when it follows either the @deva[अस्] @deva[धातु] or the  @deva[सिच्-प्रत्यय].
73097: In the context of vedas - a @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[प्रत्यय] which contains only one @deva[हल्] letter (and no @deva[अच्] letter) might or might not get an '@deva[ईट्]' @deva[आगम] when it follows either the @deva[अस्] @deva[धातु] or the @deva[सिच्-प्रत्यय].
73098: A @deva[सार्वधातुक-पित्-अपृक्त-हल्-प्रत्यय] that follows the verbs @deva[रुद्], @deva[स्वप्] , @deva[श्वस्], @deva[प्रण्], @deva[जक्ष्] gets an  @deva[ईट्] @deva[आगम].
73099: A @deva[सार्वधातुक-पित्-अपृक्त-हल्-प्रत्यय] that follows the verbs @deva[रुद्], @deva[स्वप्] , @deva[श्वस्], @deva[प्रण्], @deva[जक्ष्] optionally gets an @deva[अट्] @deva[आगम].
73100: A @deva[सार्वधातुक-अपृक्त-प्रत्यय] that follows the verb  @deva[अद्] gets an  @deva[अट्] @deva[आगम].
73101: The last letter of an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] becomes @deva[दीर्घ] when followed by a @deva[यञादि] @deva[सार्वधातुक] @deva[प्रत्यय].
73102: The last letter of an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग]  becomes @deva[दीर्घ] when followed by a @deva[यञादि] @deva[सुप्-प्रत्यय].
73103: The last letter of an @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets an @deva[एकारादेश] when followed by a @deva[सुप्-प्रत्यय] which begins with a @deva[झल] letter and which represents @deva[बहुवचन].
73104: An @deva[अदन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets a @deva[एकारादेश] in presence of the @deva[ओस्-प्रत्यय].
73105: An @deva[आबन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets @deva[एकारादेश] in presence of the @deva[ओस्] and @deva[टा] @deva[प्रत्यय].
73106: An @deva[आबन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets an @deva[एकारादेश] in presence of the  @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय] of  @deva[सम्बोधन-एकवचन].
73107: For the words that are used with the meaning same as @deva[अम्बा], and for the words that get the @deva[नदीसंज्ञा], the @deva[अङ्ग] get a @deva[ह्रस्वादेश] in presence of  @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय] of @deva[सम्बोधन-एकवचन].
73108: If an @deva[अङ्ग] ends in @deva[ह्रस्व] letter, that @deva[ह्रस्व] letter gets a @deva[गुणादेश] in presence of the @deva[सुँ-प्रत्यय] of @deva[सम्बोधन] @deva[एकवचन].
73109: If an @deva[अङ्ग] ends in @deva[ह्रस्व] letter, that @deva[ह्रस्व] letter gets a @deva[गुणादेश] in presence of the @deva[जस्-प्रत्यय].
73110: The last letter of a @deva[ऋदन्त] word is replaced by @deva[अर्] in presence of  - (a) @deva[ङि-प्रत्यय] and (b) a @deva[प्रत्यय] that is also a @deva[सर्वनामस्थान].
73111: A @deva[घि-संज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] gets a @deva[गुणादेश] in presence of a @deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय].
73112: A @deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय] that comes after a @deva[नदीसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] get an @deva[आट्] @deva[आगम].
73113: A @deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय] that comes after an  @deva[आबन्त] word get a @deva[याट्] @deva[आगम].
73114: A @deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय] that comes after an @deva[सर्वनामसंज्ञक] @deva[आबन्त] word get a @deva[स्याट्] @deva[आगम], and the @deva[आबन्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets a @deva[ह्रस्वादेश].
73115: A @deva[ङित्-प्रत्यय] that comes after the words @deva[द्वितीया] and @deva[तृतीया] optionally get a @deva[स्याट्] @deva[आगम], and @deva[अङ्ग] becomes @deva[ह्रस्व] when such an @deva[आगम] happens.
73116: The @deva[ङि-प्रत्यय] gets @deva[आमादेश] when it comes after -  (a) a @deva[नदीसंज्ञक] word,  (b) an @deva[आबन्त] word, and (c) a word that ends in '@deva[नी]'.
73117: The @deva[ङि-प्रत्यय] gets @deva[आमादेश] when it comes after a @deva[ह्रस्व-इकारान्त] or @deva[ह्रस्व-उकारान्त] @deva[नदीसंज्ञक] word.
73118: The @deva[ङि-प्रत्यय] gets @deva[औ] @deva[आदेश] when it comes after a @deva[ह्रस्व-इकारान्त] or @deva[ह्रस्व-उकारान्त] word.
73119: The @deva[ङि-प्रत्यय] that comes after a @deva[घिसंज्ञक] @deva[इकारान्त]/@deva[उकारान्त] word gets @deva[औ-आदेश], and the  @deva[भवति], and the last letter of the @deva[घिसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] gets an @deva[अकारादेश] ।
73120: The @deva[आङ्-प्रत्यय] that comes after a non-feminine @deva[घिसंज्ञक] @deva[अङ्ग] is converted to '@deva[ना]'.
74028: A @deva[ऋकारान्त-धातु] get a @deva[रिङ्-आदेश] in presence of  '@deva[श]' @deva[प्रत्यय],  @deva[यक्-प्रत्यय] and @deva[आशीर्लिङ्] @deva[लकार].
74049: A  @deva[सकारान्त] @deva[अङ्ग] gets a @deva[तकारादेश] When followed by a @deva[सकारादि-आर्धधातुक] @deva[प्रत्यय].
74050: The @deva[सकार] of @deva[तास्] @deva[प्रत्यय] and the verb root  @deva[अस्] is removed when followed by @deva[सकार].
74051: The last letter (@deva[सकार]) of the @deva[तास्-प्रत्यय] is removed when followed by a @deva[रेफ].
74060: Only the first  @deva[हल्] letter from @deva[अभ्यास] is retained, rest all  @deva[हल्] letters are removed.
74061: For an @deva[अभ्यास], all @deva[खय्] letters that follows @deva[शर्] letters are retained, all other @deva[हल्] letters are removed.
74062: The @deva[कवर्गीय] letter and the @deva[हकार] of an @deva[अभ्यास] are converted to an appropriate @deva[चवर्गीय] letter.
74066: A @deva[ऋ]  letter present in an @deva[अभ्यास] is converted to  @deva[अकार].
74073: When followed by @deva[लिट्-लकार], the @deva[अभ्यास] of the verb root @deva[भू] is converted to @deva[अकार].
81001: In the contexts that will henceforth be told till the sutra <<@deva[पदस्य]>> @ref[8.1.16], the participating words will get duplicated.
81002: When a word gets replicated in the '@deva[सर्वस्य] @deva[द्वे]' @deva[अधिकार], the second occurrence is known as @deva[आम्रेडित].
82001: The rules defined in @deva[त्रिपादी] are non existent with-respect-to the rules of @deva[सपादसप्ताध्यायी]. Even within @deva[त्रिपादी], the later rules are non existent with-respect-to the former rules.
82002: The @deva[नकारलोप] given by '@deva[न] @deva[लोपः] @deva[प्रातिपदिकान्तस्य]' is @deva[असिद्ध] only with reference to (1) @deva[सुप्-विधि], (2) @deva[स्वरविधि], (3) @deva[संज्ञाविधि], and (4) @deva[तुगागम] caused by a @deva[कृत्-प्रत्यय].
82003: The @deva[मु]  @deva[आदेश] is not considered @deva[असिद्ध] while and after doing the '@deva[ना]' @deva[आदेश].
82007: The terminal @deva[न्] letter of a @deva[प्रातिपदिक] is omitted if the @deva[प्रातिपदिक] also gets the @deva[पदसंंज्ञा].
82008:
For a @deva[प्रातिपदिक] that also gets the @deva[पदसंंज्ञा], the terminal @deva[न्] letter is not omitted in presence of the      
@deva[ङि] or @deva[सम्बुद्धि] @deva[प्रत्यय].
82023: The last letter of a @deva[पद] that ends in a @deva[संयोग] is removed.
82024: For a @deva[संयोग] occurring at end of a @deva[पद] which contains @deva[रेफ] as the first letter, the last letter is deleted only if it is a @deva[सकार] and not otherwise.
82029: If there is a @deva[संयोगः] at end of a @deva[पद], or if there is a @deva[संयोगः] which is followed by a @deva[झल्-वर्ण],  and if the first letter of that @deva[संयोगः] is either @deva[स्] or @deva[क्] , then this letter is deleted.
82030: A @deva[चवर्गीय] letter which occurs at the end of a @deva[पद] or before @deva[झल्] letter is converted to the corresponding @deva[कवर्गीय] letter.
82031: A  @deva[हकार] is converted to a @deva[ढकार] at @deva[पदान्त] or when followed by a @deva[झल्] letter.
82032: A @deva[हकार] occurring at end of a @deva[दकारादि-धातु] is converted to a @deva[घकार] at @deva[पदान्त] or when followed by a @deva[झल्] letter.
82033: A @deva[हकार] occurring at end of verbs @deva[द्रुहँ], @deva[मुहँ], @deva[ष्णुहँ] and @deva[ष्णिहँ]   at @deva[पदान्त] or when followed by a @deva[झल्] letter is converted optionally to a @deva[घकार].
82034: The @deva[हकार] for the verb @deva[नह्] is converted to @deva[धकार] at @deva[पदान्त] or when followed by a @deva[झल्] letter.
82035: The @deva[हकार] of '@deva[आह्]' is converted to @deva[थकार] when followed by a @deva[झल्] letter.
82036: The laster letter of the word @deva[व्रश्च्], @deva[भ्रस्ज्], @deva[सृज्], @deva[मृज्], @deva[यज्], @deva[राज्], @deva[भ्राज्] and  @deva[शकारान्त] /  @deva[च्छकारान्त] words gets @deva[षकारादेश] at @deva[पदान्त], or when @deva[झल्] letter is in front.
82037: A @deva[बश्-वर्ण] of an @deva[एकाच्] and @deva[झषन्त] part of a verb is converted to a @deva[भष्] @deva[वर्ण] - (1) in presence of a @deva[सकार], (2) in presence of a  the word @deva[ध्व], or (3) at end of a @deva[पद]
82038: The @deva[बश्]-letter of the the @deva[झषन्त-एकाच्-अवयव] present in the '@deva[दध्]' form of the verb root '@deva[धा]' is converted to a corresponding @deva[भष्] letter when followed by  @deva[तकार], @deva[थकार], @deva[सकार], or the word @deva[ध्व].
82039: A @deva[झल्] letter occurring at end of a @deva[पद] is converted to the corresponding @deva[जश्] letter.
82040: The @deva[तकार] and @deva[थकार] that follows a @deva[झष्] letter is converted to  @deva[धकार]. But this conversion does not happen for the verb  root '@deva[धा]'.
82041: @deva[षकार] and  @deva[ढकार] not occurring at end of a @deva[पद] are converted to  @deva[ककार] when followed by @deva[सकार].
82062: The word ending in a @deva[क्विन्-प्रत्यय] gets a @deva[कवर्गादेश] at @deva[पदान्त] ।
82063: The word @deva[नश्] undergoes an optional @deva[कुत्वम्] at @deva[पदान्त].
82064: A @deva[मकार] occurring at end of a @deva[धातु] which in turn occurs at end of a @deva[पद] is converted to @deva[नकार].
82066: The @deva[सकार] at end of a @deva[पद], and the @deva[षकार] at end of the @deva[सजुष्] @deva[पद] get a @deva[रुँ-आदेश] ।
82069: The word @deva[अहन्] gets @deva[रेफादेश] at @deva[पदान्त], except when followed by a @deva[सुप्-प्रत्यय].
82076: The @deva[उपधा] letter of a @deva[रेफान्त] or a @deva[वकारान्त] @deva[पद] which also has a @deva[धातुसंज्ञा] becomes @deva[दीर्घ] if that letter belongs to the @deva[इक्] @deva[प्रत्याहार].
82077: The @deva[उपधा] letter of a @deva[रेफान्त] or a @deva[वकारान्त] @deva[धातु] becomes @deva[दीर्घ] if that letter belongs to the @deva[इक्] @deva[प्रत्याहार] and if the @deva[धातु] is followed by a @deva[हल्] letter.
82078: When a @deva[धातु] has (1)  a @deva[हल्]-letter at the end (2) a @deva[रेफ] / @deva[वकार] in the second-last position, and (3) an @deva[इक्] letter in the third-last position, then the @deva[इक्] letter undergoes a @deva[दीर्घादेश].
82082: In the context of all the @deva[सूत्राणि] till the end of this @deva[पाद], the @deva[टि-संज्ञक] @deva[स्वर] of the sentence would be considered @deva[प्लुत] and @deva[उदात्त].
82083: The @deva[टिसंज्ञक] of the sentence which is used to answer a greeting, becomes @deva[प्लुत]  and @deva[उदात्त], provided that the sentence is not addressed to a @deva[शूद्र].
82084: The @deva[टिसंज्ञक] @deva[स्वर] of the sentence used for calling someone from a distance becomes @deva[प्लुत] and @deva[उदात्त].
82085: If the words @deva[हे] / @deva[है] are used in a sentence that is used for calling someone from a distance, then the @deva[स्वर] of the only @deva[हे] / @deva[है] becomes @deva[प्लुत] and @deva[उदात्त].
82086: For the words whose @deva[टि] has been mandated to be @deva[प्लुत] and @deva[उदात्त] by the earlier sutras, all the other @deva[ऋकारभिन्न] @deva[गुरु] letters of that word can also take turns one by one to become @deva[प्लुत] and @deva[उदात्त], according to the experts of the east.
83001: In the Vedic usages, the @deva[पद] ending in @deva[मतुँप्] or @deva[क्वसुँ] @deva[प्रत्यय] undergo @deva[रुँत्वम्] in the formation of @deva[सम्बोधन-एकवचन] form.
83002: For the @deva[रुँ] generated using the rules from this @deva[रूत्वप्रकरण], the letter before  this @deva[रुँ] is optionally converted to an @deva[अनुनासिक].
83003: In this @deva[रूत्वप्रकरण], The @deva[रुँ] that gets constructed at end of a @deva[पद] causes an @deva[अनुनासिक] of the @deva[आकार] just preceding it.
83004: If the @deva[रुँ] letter generated in this @deva[रूत्वप्रकरण] does not cause the previous letter to get an @deva[अनुनासिक], then it will generate an @deva[अनुस्वार] @deva[आगम] just after that previous letter.
83005: When followed by  @deva[सुट्] @deva[आगम], the @deva[मकार] of @deva[सम्] is converted to @deva[रुँ].
83006: In the context of @deva[संहिता], when the word @deva[पुम्] is followed by a letter from @deva[खय्]  @deva[प्रत्याहार] which in turn is followed by a letter form @deva[अम्] @deva[प्रत्याहार], the @deva[मकार] of @deva[पुम्] is converted to @deva[रुँ].
83007: In the context of @deva[संहिता], when a @deva[पदान्त] @deva[नकार] is followed by a letter from @deva[छव्] @deva[प्रत्याहार], which in turn is followed by a letter from @deva[अम्] @deva[प्रत्याहार], then the @deva[नकार] is converted to @deva[रुँ]. But this conversion does not happen for the word '@deva[प्रशान्]'.
83008: In the context of @deva[संहिता] and in the vedas, when a @deva[पदान्त] @deva[नकार] is followed by a letter from @deva[छव्] @deva[प्रत्याहार], which in turn is followed by a letter from @deva[अम्] @deva[प्रत्याहार], then the @deva[नकार] is optionally converted to @deva[रुँ].
83009: In the context of @deva[वेदाः] - If a @deva[पदान्त-नकार] present after a @deva[दीर्घ] @deva[स्वर] is followed by a letter from the @deva[अट्] @deva[प्रत्याहार] in the same @deva[पाद], then the @deva[नकार] is optionally converted to @deva[रुँ].
83010: In the context of @deva[संहिता], the ending @deva[नकार] of the word @deva[नॄन्] , when followed by @deva[पकार] is optionally converted to @deva[रुँ].
83011: In the context of @deva[संहिता], when the word @deva[स्वतवान्] is followed by the word @deva[पायु], the @deva[नकार] of @deva[स्वतवान्] is optionally converted to  @deva[रुँ].
83012: The @deva[नकार] of  '@deva[कान्]' is converted to @deva[रुँ] when followed by an @deva[आम्रेडित].
83013: A @deva[ढकार] is removed when it is followed by another  @deva[ढकार] in the context of @deva[संहिता].
83014: A @deva[रेफ] is removed when it is followed by another  @deva[रेफ] in the context of @deva[संहिता].
83015: A @deva[र्] present at end of a  @deva[पद] is converted to a @deva[विसर्ग] when it is either followed by nothing, or when it is followed by a @deva[खर्] letter in the context of @deva[संहिता].
83016: In presence of the @deva[सुप्] @deva[प्रत्यय] of @deva[सप्तमी-बहुवचन], a @deva[पदान्त] @deva[र्-वर्ण] is converted to a @deva[विसर्ग] only if that @deva[र्] is generated from @deva[रुँ], and not otherwise.
83017: In the context of @deva[संहिता], A @deva[पदान्त] @deva[रुँ] that is present either at the end of @deva[भोस्]/@deva[भगोस्]/@deva[अघोस्], or after the letter @deva[अ]/@deva[आ] is converted to @deva[यकार] when followed by a letter from the @deva[अश्] @deva[प्रत्याहार].
83018: In the context of @deva[संहिता], according to @deva[शाकटायन], the @deva[पदान्त-वकार] and  @deva[पदान्त-यकार], when followed by a letter from @deva[अश्-प्रत्याहार] are converted respectively to  @deva[लघु-उच्चारण-वकार] and @deva[लघु-उच्चारण-यकार].
83019: According to Shakalya, a @deva[वकार]/@deva[यकार] present at end of a  @deva[पद] and situated after @deva[अ]/@deva[आ] gets removed when it is followed by a letter from @deva[अश्] @deva[प्रत्याहार] in the context of @deva[संहिता].
83020: Non-@deva[लघूच्चारण-यकार] present at end of a  @deva[पद] and situated after the letter @deva[ओ] gets removed when it is followed by a letter from @deva[अश्] @deva[प्रत्याहार] in the context of @deva[संहिता].
83021: A @deva[पदान्तयकार] and a @deva[पदान्तवकार] coming after an @deva[अकार] is removed when followed by the @deva[पद] @deva[उञ्] in the context of @deva[संहिता].
83022: In the context of @deva[संहिता], all the grammarians say that the normal @deva[यकार] as well as the @deva[लघु-उच्चारण-यकार] is removed when it is followed by a @deva[हल्]-letter, provided that such a @deva[यकार] occurs at end of a @deva[पद] and comes after the letter @deva[अ] , or if such a @deva[यकार] occurs at the end of the words @deva[भोस्], @deva[भगोस्], or @deva[अघोस्].
83023: In the context of @deva[संहिता], the @deva[मकार] at the end of a @deva[पद] is converted to @deva[अनुस्वार] when it is followed by a @deva[हल्] @deva[वर्ण].
83024: In the context of @deva[संहिता], a @deva[मकार] and a @deva[नकार] which do not occur at the end of a @deva[पद] are converted to @deva[अनुस्वार] when followed by a @deva[झल्] letter.
83025: When the verb @deva[सम्] + @deva[राज्] gets the @deva[क्विप्] pratyay, the @deva[म्] of @deva[सम्] is converted to @deva[म्] itself.
83026: In the context of @deva[संहिता], if a @deva[पदान्तमकार] is followed by '@deva[ह्] + @deva[म्]' then that @deva[पदान्तमकार] is optionally converted to @deva[मकार].
83027: In the context of @deva[संहिता], if a @deva[पदान्तमकार] is followed by '@deva[ह्] + @deva[न्]' then that @deva[पदान्तमकार] is optionally converted to @deva[नकार].
83028: In the context of @deva[संहिता], a @deva[ङकार] and a @deva[णकार] at end of a @deva[पद] optionally get @deva[कुक्] and  @deva[टुक्] @deva[आगम] respectively.
83029: In the context of @deva[संहिता],  a @deva[सकार] present after a @deva[पदान्त] @deva[डकार] optionally gets a @deva[धुट्] @deva[आगम].
83030: In the context of @deva[संहिता],  a @deva[सकार] present after a @deva[पदान्त] @deva[नकार] optionally gets a @deva[धुट्] @deva[आगम].
83031: In the context of @deva[संहिता], a @deva[नकार] occurring at end of a @deva[पद] optionally gets a @deva[तुगागम] when followed by a @deva[शकार].
83032: In the context of @deva[संहिता], @deva[अ] @deva[ङ्]/@deva[ण्]/@deva[न्] letter occurring after a @deva[ह्रस्व] @deva[स्वर] causes a corresponding @deva[ङुट्] / @deva[णुट्]  / @deva[नुट्]  @deva[आगम] to an @deva[अच्] letter following it.
83033: In the context of @deva[संहिता], when a letter of the @deva[मय्] @deva[प्रत्याहार] occurring at end of a @deva[पद] is followed by word @deva[उञ्] which in turn is followed by a @deva[स्वर], then the word @deva[उञ्] is optionally converted to a @deva[वकार].
83034: A @deva[विसर्ग] occurring at end of a @deva[पद] is converted to a @deva[सकार] when followed by a letter from the @deva[खर्] @deva[प्रत्याहार].
83035: A @deva[विसर्ग] is converted to @deva[विसर्ग] if it is followed by a  @deva[खर्] letter after which a  @deva[शर्] letter is present.
83036: When a @deva[विसर्ग] is followed by a letter from the @deva[शर्प्रत्याहार], the @deva[विसर्ग] optionally remains as @deva[विसर्ग].
83037:
When a @deva[विसर्ग] is followed by a @deva[ककार] or a @deva[खकार], it is converted either to a @deva[जिह्वामूलीय] or to a @deva[विसर्ग]. 
When a @deva[विसर्ग] is followed by a @deva[पकार] or a @deva[फकार], it is converted either to a @deva[उपध्मानीय] or to a @deva[विसर्ग].
83038: A @deva[पदान्त] @deva[विसर्ग] is converted to a @deva[सकार] when it is followed by the @deva[प्रत्ययाः] @deva[पाश्य], @deva[कल्प], @deva[क], @deva[काम्य].
83039: A @deva[पदान्त] @deva[विसर्ग] which comes after a letter from the @deva[इण्] @deva[प्रत्याहार], and which is followed by @deva[प्रत्ययाः] - @deva[पाश्य], @deva[कल्प], @deva[क], @deva[काम्य] - is converted to a @deva[षकार].
83040: The @deva[विसर्ग]  of @deva[गतिसंज्ञक] @deva[नमस्]  and @deva[पुरस्] words is converted to @deva[सकार] when followed by @deva[कवर्ग] letter or a  @deva[पवर्ग] letter.
83041: A @deva[विसर्ग] present after an @deva[इकार] or an @deva[उकार] which is not made from a @deva[प्रत्यय] is converted to @deva[ष] in presence of a @deva[कवर्ग] or a @deva[पवर्ग].
83042: The @deva[विसर्ग] of the word @deva[तिरस्] is optionally converted to @deva[सकार] in presence of @deva[कवर्ग] / @deva[पवर्ग] letter.
83043: For the words @deva[द्विस्] (= twice), @deva[त्रिस्]  (= thrice), and @deva[चतुर्] = (four times) which are used to indicate frequency, their @deva[विसर्ग] when followed by a letter from @deva[कवर्ग] or @deva[पवर्ग] is optionally converted to @deva[ष्].
83044: The @deva[विसर्ग] of the @deva[इस्]/@deva[उस्-प्रत्यय] when followed by a letter from @deva[कवर्ग] or @deva[पवर्ग] is optionally converted to a @deva[षकार] whenever the words involved in the @deva[सन्धि] are associated with each other.
83045: While doing a @deva[समास], the @deva[विसर्ग] of the @deva[इस्]/@deva[उस्-प्रत्यय] when followed by a letter from @deva[कवर्ग] or @deva[पवर्ग] is always converted to a @deva[षकार] whenever the words involved in the @deva[समास] are associated with each other. However, if the @deva[पूर्वपद] of this @deva[समास] is a @deva[समास] on its own, then the @deva[षत्व] is completely prohibited.
83046:
While doing a @deva[समास], if all the following conditions are met - 
1. the @deva[पूर्वपद] ends in a @deva[विसर्ग] that follows an @deva[अकार], 
2. the @deva[उत्तरपद] is either a form of the verb '@deva[कृ]', or a form of the verb '@deva[कमि]' or is one of these words - @deva[कंस]/@deva[कुम्भ]/@deva[पात्र]/@deva[कुशा]/@deva[कर्णी]
3. @deva[पू्र्वपद] is not an @deva[अव्यय]
4.  @deva[पू्र्वपद] is not a @deva[समास]
- then the @deva[विसर्ग] of the @deva[पूर्वपद] is converted to @deva[सकार].
83047: While doing a @deva[समास], if the @deva[पूर्वपद] is either the word @deva[अधः] or the word @deva[शिरः] and if the the @deva[उत्तरपद] the word @deva[पद], then then the @deva[विसर्ग] of the @deva[पूर्वपद] is converted to @deva[सकार]. However, if the @deva[पूर्वपद] is itself a @deva[समास], then this @deva[सकारादेश] does not happen.
83048: For the words in the @deva[कस्कादिगण], the @deva[विसर्ग] is to be converted to @deva[षकार] / @deva[सकार] as shown for each word.
83055: This is an @deva[अधिकार], which goes till the end of the @deva[पाद]. For the @deva[स्थानी] that does not occur at end of a @deva[पद], the closest '@deva[मूर्धन्य]' letter comes as the @deva[आदेश].
83056: The @deva[अपदान्त-सकार] present in the '@deva[साड्]' form of the verb @deva[सह्] is converted to @deva[षकार].
83057: This is an @deva[अधिकार], which goes till the end of the @deva[पाद]. The @deva[कार्य] designated in this @deva[अधिकार] happens for a @deva[स्थानी] that follows an @deva[इण्] letter or a letter from @deva[कवर्ग].
83058: The @deva[षकारादेश] mandated in the @deva[इण्कोः] @deva[अधिकार] happens even when at most one of @deva[अनुस्वार]/@deva[विसर्ग]/@deva[शकार]/@deva[षकार]/@deva[सकार] appears between the @deva[इण्]/@deva[कुवर्ग] @deva[वर्ण] and the @deva[सकार].
83059: An @deva[अपदान्त] @deva[सकार] that was obtained either as an @deva[आदेश] or through a @deva[प्रत्यय]  is converted to @deva[षकार] when it follows a letter from @deva[इण्-प्रत्याहार] or a @deva[कवर्ग].
83060: The @deva[सकार] of the verb roots @deva[शास्]/@deva[वस्]/@deva[घस्] is converted to @deva[षकार] when it follows a letter from the @deva[इण्-प्रत्याहार] or the @deva[कवर्ग].
84001: a @deva[नकार] occurring immediately after @deva[ष्] or @deva[र्]  in the same @deva[पद] is converted to a @deva[णकार].
84002: a @deva[नकार] occurring after @deva[ष्] or @deva[र्] in the same @deva[पद] is converted to a @deva[णकार] even when it is separated from the @deva[ष्] or @deva[र्]  by one or more letters from the @deva[अट्] @deva[प्रत्याहार], @deva[कवर्ग], @deva[पवर्ग], @deva[आङ्] , or @deva[अनुस्वार].
84003: For a @deva[समस्तपद] which is defined as a @deva[संज्ञा], The @deva[र्] and @deva[ष्] present in the  @deva[पूर्वपद] causes the @deva[णत्वम्] of @deva[नकार] from the @deva[उत्तरपद], as long as there is no @deva[गकार] in between.
84012: For a @deva[समस्तपद],  a @deva[रेफ] or a @deva[षकार] present in the @deva[पूर्वपद]  causes the @deva[णत्व] of the @deva[नकार] present in the  @deva[एकाच्] @deva[उत्तरपद] whenever the @deva[नकार] is (1) at end of a @deva[प्रातिपदिक], or (2) created due to a  @deva[नुमागम], or (3) part of a @deva[विभक्ति].
84014: A @deva[धातु] which has @deva[णकार] in the @deva[औपदेशिक] form get @deva[णत्वम्]   in presence of an @deva[उपसर्ग]  that has @deva[रेफ] or @deva[षकार].
84015: The  @deva[नकार] associated with the forms of the verbs  @deva[हि] and  @deva[मी] is converted to @deva[णकार] in presence of a @deva[रेफयुक्त] @deva[उपसर्ग].
84016: A @deva[रेफ] present in an  @deva[उपसर्ग] causes the @deva[णत्व] of  @deva[नकार] of the  '@deva[आनि]' @deva[प्रत्यय] of @deva[लोट्-लकार].
84017: A @deva[णत्वनिमित्तक] @deva[उपसर्ग] causes the  @deva[णत्व] of the @deva[उपसर्ग] '@deva[नि]' attached to the following verbs -  @deva[गद्], @deva[नद्], @deva[पत्], @deva[पद्], @deva[मा], @deva[सो], @deva[हन्], @deva[या], @deva[वा], @deva[द्रा], @deva[प्सा], @deva[वप्], @deva[वह्], @deva[शम्], @deva[चि], @deva[दिह्] , and also for @deva[घुसंज्ञक] verbs.
84018: A @deva[णत्वनिमित्तक] @deva[उपसर्ग] causes an optional @deva[णत्व] of the @deva[उपसर्ग] '@deva[नि]' attached to the verbs that are not @deva[ककारादि], not @deva[खकारादि], not @deva[षकारान्त] and not mentioned in <<@deva[नेर्गदनद]..>> @ref[8.4.16] sutra.
84019: The @deva[नकार] of the verb '@deva[अन्] (@deva[प्राणने])' becomes @deva[णकार] when the verb is used along with an @deva[उपसर्ग] that could cause the @deva[णत्व] to happen (like @deva[प्र] or @deva[परा]).
84020: When the verb @deva[अन्] (@deva[प्राणने]) is used along with a @deva[रेफ]/@deva[षकारयुक्त] @deva[उपसर्ग] (like @deva[प्र] or @deva[परा]), its @deva[नकार] becomes @deva[णकार] when it appears at the end of a @deva[पद].
84021: When the verb @deva[अन्] (@deva[प्राणने]) is used along with a @deva[रेफ]/@deva[षकारयुक्त] @deva[उपसर्ग] (like @deva[प्र] or @deva[परा]), and when such a verb undergoes a @deva[द्वित्व], then both of the @deva[नकार]s become @deva[णकार].
84022: When the word @deva[हन्]  comes after an @deva[उपसर्ग] containing a @deva[रेफ], the @deva[नकार] of @deva[हन्] is converted to @deva[णकार] only if that @deva[नकार] is preceded by an @deva[अकार], not otherwise.
84023: When the word @deva[हन्]  comes after an @deva[उपसर्ग] containing a @deva[रेफ], and when the @deva[नकार] of @deva[हन्] is preceded by a @deva[ह्रस्व] @deva[अकार],  this @deva[नकार] is optionally converted to @deva[णकार] in presence of a @deva[प्रत्यय] that begins with a @deva[वकार] or a @deva[मकार].
84024: The @deva[नकार] of @deva[हन्] is converted to @deva[णकार] when this word follows the word '@deva[अन्तर्]' and when this @deva[नकार] is preceded by a @deva[ह्रस्व] @deva[अकार]. But this @deva[णत्व] does not happen if the resultant word indicates the name of a place.
84025: The @deva[नकार] of @deva[अयन] is converted to @deva[णकार] when this word follows the word '@deva[अन्तर्]'.  But this @deva[णत्व] does not happen if the resultant word indicates the name of a place.
84037: A @deva[नकार] occurring at end of a @deva[पद] does not get @deva[णत्वम्] ।
84040: In the context of @deva[संहिता], A @deva[सकार] and a @deva[तवर्ग] letter are converted (respectively) to a  @deva[शकार] and @deva[चवर्ग] letter when associated with a @deva[शकार] or a @deva[चवर्ग] letter.
84041: In the context of @deva[संहिता], A @deva[सकार] and a @deva[तवर्ग] letter are converted (respectively) to a @deva[षकार] and @deva[टवर्ग] letter when associated with a @deva[षकार] or a @deva[टवर्ग] letter.
84042: Except when followed by the @deva[प्रत्यय] @deva[नाम्], a @deva[पदान्तटवर्ग] letter does not cause the @deva[ष्टुत्वम्] of  @deva[सकार] or a @deva[तवर्ग] letter that follows it.
84043: A @deva[तवर्ग] letter which is followed by a @deva[षकार] does not undergo  @deva[ष्टुत्वम्].
84044: A @deva[तवर्गीय] letter following a @deva[शकार] does not undergo @deva[श्चुत्वम्].
84045: A @deva[यर्] letter occurring at end of a  @deva[पद] is optionally converted to an @deva[अनुनासिक] when it is followed by an @deva[अनुनासिक].
84046: If @deva[र्] or @deva[ह्] is present after @deva[अच्] letter, then a @deva[यर्] letter occurring after such a @deva[र्] or @deva[ह्] is optionally duplicated.
84047: The @deva[यर्] letter that  follows an @deva[अच्]  letter but is not followed by an @deva[अच्]  letter is optionally duplicated.
84048: The @deva[तकार] of the word @deva[पुत्रादिनी] does not get a @deva[द्वित्व] when this word is used while shouting / while talking in angry tone.
84049: A @deva[शर्]-letter does not undergo @deva[द्वित्वम्] when followed by an @deva[अच्] letter.
84050: According to @deva[शाकटायन], when three or more letters are joined using a @deva[संयोग], the @deva[द्वित्वम्] does not happen.
84051: According to @deva[शाकल्य], a @deva[यर्] letter is never duplicated.
84052: According to various experts, a @deva[यर्]-letter following a @deva[दीर्घ] letter does not undergo @deva[द्वित्वम्].
84053: A @deva[झल्]-letter is converted to a corresponding @deva[जश्]-letter when followed by a @deva[झश्] letter.
84054: A @deva[झल्] letter present in an  @deva[अभ्यास] is converted either to a @deva[जश्] letter or a @deva[चर्] letter as appropriate.
84055: A @deva[झल्]-letter is converted to a corresponding @deva[चर्]-letter when followed by a @deva[खर्]-letter.
84056: A @deva[झल्]  letter is optionally converted to a corresponding @deva[चर्] -letter when it is not followed by any other letter.
84057: The @deva[अण्] letter of a non-@deva[प्रगृह्य] word becomes @deva[अनुनासिक] optionally when it is followed by an @deva[अवसान].
84058: An @deva[अनुस्वार] when followed by a @deva[यय्] @deva[वर्ण] is converted to the @deva[परसवर्ण].
84059: An @deva[अनुस्वार] occurring at end of a @deva[पद] when followed by a @deva[यय्] @deva[वर्ण] is optionally converted to the @deva[परसवर्ण].
84060: A letter of @deva[तवर्ग] is converted to a @deva[परसवर्ण] when followed by a @deva[लकार].
84061: The @deva[स्था] and @deva[स्तम्भ्] are converted to @deva[पूर्वसवर्ण] when they follow the upasarga @deva[उत्] ।
84062: A @deva[हकार] following a @deva[झय्] letter is optionally converted to the @deva[पूर्वसवर्ण] (i.e. @deva[वर्गचतुर्थ]).
84063: A  @deva[शकार] sandwiched between a @deva[झय्] letter on the left and an @deva[अट्] letter on the right is optionally converted to a @deva[छकार].
84064: A @deva[यम्]-letter sandwiched between a @deva[हल्]-letter (on left) and the same  @deva[यम्]-letter (on right) is optionally removed.
84065: A @deva[झर्] letter coming after an @deva[हल्]  letter is optionally deleted if it is followed by a @deva[सवर्ण] @deva[झर्] letter.
84068: The @deva[ह्रस्वः] @deva[अकारः] which was being treated as @deva[विवृत] during the @deva[प्रक्रिया] now becomes @deva[संवृतः] for @deva[प्रयोग].
61100: When a word which is used to imitate some abstract sound and which ends is the phrase '@deva[त्]' is followed by an @deva[आम्रेडितसंज्ञक] which is further followed by the pratyay @deva[डाच्], then the '@deva[त्]' of the first word and the first letter of the @deva[आम्रेडितसंज्ञक] are combined to form a @deva[पररूप-एकादेश].
